issue.title: [GLib] Add arrow::compute::RoundToMultipleOptions bindings
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-15216](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-15216). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
Currently it is not possible to pass options to `round_to_multiple` compute functions

comments.body:
